title: Chapter One: The Vanishing of Will Byers
synopsis: On his way home from a friend's house, young Will Byers sees something terrifying. Nearby, a sinister secret lurks in the depths of a government lab.

title: Chapter Two: The Weirdo on Maple Street
synopsis: Lucas, Mike and Dustin try to communicate with Eleven. Hopper questions an anxious Joyce about an unsettling phone call.

title: Chapter Three: Holly, Jolly
synopsis: An increasingly frantic Joyce meets strange occurrences in her house. Nancy and Jonathan form an alliance. Eleven revives painful memories.

title: Chapter Four: The Body
synopsis: Refusing to believe Will is dead, Joyce tries to connect with her missing son. The boys give Eleven a makeover.

title: Chapter Five: The Flea and the Acrobat
synopsis: Hopper breaks into the lab while Nancy and Jonathan confront the force that took Will. The boys ask Mr. Clarke about interdimensional travel.

title: Chapter Six: The Monster
synopsis: A frantic Jonathan looks for Nancy in the darkness, but Steve's looking for her too. Hopper and Joyce uncover the truth about the lab.

title: Chapter Seven: The Bathtub
synopsis: Eleven struggles to reach Will, while Lucas warns that 'ichael bad men' are close. Nancy and Jonathan show the police what Jonathan caught on camera.

title: Chapter Eight: The Upside Down
synopsis: Dr. Brenner holds Hopper and Joyce for questioning while the boys face the monster. Will's survival hangs in the balance.

title: Chapter One: MADMAX
synopsis: As the town preps for Halloween, a high-scoring rivalry takes root at the local arcade. Hopper's search for the truth leads him to a new threat.

title: Chapter Two: Trick or Treat, Freak
synopsis: After Will sees something horrible on trick-or-treat night, Mike wonders whether Eleven is still out there. Nancy struggles with her guilt.

title: Chapter Three: The Pollywog
synopsis: Dustin adopts a strange new pet, and Eleven grows increasingly impatient. A suspicious Hopper dives back into the supernatural.

title: Chapter Four: Will the Wise
synopsis: An ailing Will opens up to Joyce — with disturbing results. While Hopper digs for the truth, Eleven unearths a surprising connection.

title: Chapter Five: Dig Dug
synopsis: Nancy and Jonathan swap conspiracy theories with a new ally as Eleven searches for answers about her past. 'Bob the Brain' tackles a difficult puzzle.

title: Chapter Six: The Spy
synopsis: Will's connection to a shadowy evil grows stronger, but no one's quite sure how to stop it. Elsewhere, Dustin and Steve team up.

title: Chapter Seven: The Lost Sister
synopsis: Eleven makes a trip to find information about her past and meets Eight, a fellow test subject from Hawkins Lab.

title: Chapter Eight: The Mind Flayer
synopsis: An unlikely hero steps forward when a horde of monsters threatens the group at Hawkins Lab. Eleven makes a powerful decision.

title: Chapter Nine: The Gate
synopsis: Eleven returns in the nick of time to help the group overcome a powerful enemy. But the fight may take the ultimate sacrifice.

title: Chapter One: Suzie, Do You Copy?
synopsis: Summer brings new jobs and budding romance. But while the kids struggle with change, there's a mysterious new threat growing in the dark.

title: Chapter Two: The Mall Rats
synopsis: Nancy and Jonathan follow a hunch while Max and Eleven venture out solo for the first time. A trip to the mall ends up raising more questions than answers.

title: Chapter Three: The Case of the Missing Lifeguard
synopsis: With El and Max in pursuit of a secret, Hopper goes to extremes to protect the group. Robin takes over a secret mission.

title: Chapter Four: The Sauna Test
synopsis: A code red brings the gang back together for the ultimate test, and Nancy takes Jonathan on a stakeout they won't soon forget.

title: Chapter Five: The Flayed
synopsis: Strange surprises lie in wait inside an old farmhouse. Then all hell breaks loose at the hospital.

title: Chapter Six: E Pluribus Unum
synopsis: Dr. Alexei reveals what the Russians have been building, and El discovers the truth about the source of the Mind Flayer's plan.

title: Chapter Seven: The Bite
synopsis: With the clock ticking and the lives of the group at stake, El must find a way to remove something that's gotten under her skin.

title: Chapter Eight: The Battle of Starcourt
synopsis: Terror descends upon Hawkins when heroes old and new battle the Mind Flayer. But a critical sacrifice may turn the tide.

title: Chapter One: The Hellfire Club
synopsis: Tensions run high as a new terror surfaces and El adjusts to life in California. A fateful D&D game begins.

title: Chapter Two: Vecna's Curse
synopsis: Nancy, Robin and Eddie piece together the true horrors of Hawkins; El devises a plan to restore her powers.

title: Chapter Three: The Monster and the Superhero
synopsis: Murray and Joyce make plans to rescue Hopper in Russia, while back in Hawkins, the friends try to help Max.

title: Chapter Four: Dear Billy
synopsis: Max finds a new clue one of Vecna's victims, as the kids race to find a way to help their friend. Meanwhile, El is tested.

title: Chapter Five: The Nina Project
synopsis: Hopper learns the secret history of the Russian prison. Nancy and Robin convince Victor to share painful secrets.

title: Chapter Six: The Dive
synopsis: With time running out, Nancy leads a group on the hunt for Vecna. El faces her past without backing down.

title: Chapter Seven: The Massacre at Hawkins Lab
synopsis: As more details of El's past come to light, the team clashes over how to escape Vecna's curse.

title: Chapter Eight: Papa
synopsis: Brenner tries to reach Eleven by revealing his own painful truths. The crew makes a last-ditch effort to fend off the army.

title: Chapter Nine: The Piggyback
synopsis: With the fate of Hawkins in the balance, the group embarks on a desperate mission. Eleven's epic confrontation with the enemy sets the stage for an uncertain future.
